name: IupsLink
description: Core Iu-ps interface link (connecting a SGSN to the RNC, BSC and HNB GW) resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: connectedRnc
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Holds the DN of an RncFunction or an ExternalRncFunction

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: connectedBss
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Holds the DN of an BssFunction or an ExternalBssFunction

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: connectedHNBGW
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Holds the DN of an HNBGWFunction
